March 26, 2020, we celebrated our 100th anniversary.\u003c/p>\n"",""postType"":""page"",""featuredMedia"":null,""additionalContent"":null,""content"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.0"",""typename"":""Hero""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.1"",""typename"":""Hero""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.2"",""typename"":""Hero""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3"",""typename"":""ExpandableList""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.4"",""typename"":""SocialMediaTeasers""}],""meta"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:47915.meta"",""typename"":""Meta""},""overrideUrls"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:47915.overrideUrls"",""typename"":""OverrideUrl""},""__typename"":""Page""},""Page:47915.content.0"":{""__typename"":""Hero"",""type"":""background"",""hero"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:47915.content.0.hero"",""typename"":""BackgroundHero""}},""$Page:47915.content.0.hero"":{""title"":""Kemira100"",""pretitle"":"""",""leadTextPosition"":""under"",""leadText"":""\u003cp>On March 26, 2020, we celebrated our 100th anniversary.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>When Kemira was founded in 1920, its main job was to provide fertilizers for Finnish farmers. Today, water, the lifeblood of human existence, is what we focus on in all our business segments from pulp and paper to water treatment and the energy sector. Over the last 100 years we have overcome many challenges and have always come out stronger as a company and better equipped to help our customers and the society. \u003c/p>\n\u003cp>We are now, perhaps more than ever in a strong position to continue solving society's challenges through chemistry - in close collaboration with our customers and other business partners.\u003c/p>\n"",""leadTextAuthor"":"""",""leadTextAuthorTitle"":"""",""link"":null,""__typename"":""BackgroundHero"",""image"":""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/03/kemira100-group-2-5e5cf3afd2f89.jpg"",""imageShade"":""dark""},""Page:47915.content.1"":{""__typename"":""Hero"",""type"":""video"",""hero"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:47915.content.1.hero"",""typename"":""VideoHero""}},""$Page:47915.content.1.hero"":{""title"":""Kemira100 documentary"",""pretitle"":"""",""leadTextPosition"":""inside"",""leadText"":""\u003cp>A short version of our 100 years of chemistry\u003c/p>\n"",""leadTextAuthor"":"""",""leadTextAuthorTitle"":"""",""link"":null,""__typename"":""VideoHero"",""video"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:47915.content.1.hero.video"",""typename"":""Video""}},""$Page:47915.content.1.hero.video"":{""src"":""https://youtu.be/3LeekZgKqWo"",""showAsPreview"":true,""previewDuration"":5,""__typename"":""Video""},""Page:47915.content.2"":{""__typename"":""Hero"",""type"":""none"",""hero"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:47915.content.2.hero"",""typename"":""NoneHero""}},""$Page:47915.content.2.hero"":{""title"":""Kemira's history in brief"",""pretitle"":"""",""leadTextPosition"":""under"",""leadText"":"""",""leadTextAuthor"":"""",""leadTextAuthorTitle"":"""",""link"":null,""__typename"":""NoneHero""},""Page:47915.content.3"":{""__typename"":""ExpandableList"",""items"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.0"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.1"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.2"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.3"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.4"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.5"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.6"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.7"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.8"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.9"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.10"",""typename"":""ExpandableListItem""}]},""Page:47915.content.3.items.0"":{""title"":""1920s: Start of production"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.0.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.0.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1920 Kemira founded\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>On March 1, 1920 the Council of State (Finland) established a committee to start and maintain the state-owned Sulfuric Acid and Superphosphate Plants. Parliament approved the appropriation for the establishment of the plants on March 26, 1920 and Kemira was founded with \u003cstrong>Felix Hedman\u003c/strong> as Managing Director.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1922 Production starts\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>In spring 1922, the Lappeenranta Sulfuric acid plant and Kotka A superphosphate plant was established, which marks the beginning of domestic fertilizer production.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1925 First production expansion\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The Parliament approved a bill to expand sulfuric acid and superphosphate production towards the end of 1925, and the expansions were completed by the end of 1927.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.1"":{""title"":""1930s: Pulling through the depression"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.1.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.1.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1933 The fertilizer plants are incorporated\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The worldwide depression set in motion by the 1929 US stock market crash also reached Finland, leading to decreased demand for fertilizers and scaled down production. In December, the state-owned plants were re-formed into the Sulfuric acid and Superphosphate Plants Corporation.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1935 New management \u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Following the death of Felix Hedman, \u003cstrong>Fredrik Gustaf Hackzell\u003c/strong> was appointed Manager of the Sulfuric Acid and Superphosphate Plants Corporation in 1935.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1939 Outbreak of World War II\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>A shortage of raw materials used in production led to the plants being shut down for long periods of time, and production plummeted just as the need for fertilizer was at its most desperate.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.2"":{""title"":""1940s: War and investments"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.2.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.2.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1940–1945 Fertilizer import\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The Sulfuric Acid and Superphosphate Plants Corporation was charged with the responsibility of fertilizer import in April 1940 to fill the production gaps stemming from the raw material shortage. The role proved to be instrumental for vital imports from Norway and Germany.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1944 New competition in the fertilizer industry\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The state-owned Typpi Oy was founded on March 6, 1944 to produce ammonia fertilizer becoming the first major competitor over the following decades.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1945 The Kokkola sulfuric acid plant starts production\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The Kokkola sulfuric acid plant was approved and started production after the war in May 1945 and soon after superphosphate also began. The Kokkola plants became one of the corporation’s key plant complexes.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1946 Entering gunpowder production\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>On the Council of State’s initiative in 1946, the state-owned gunpowder plant became a subsidiary of the Sulfuric Acid and Superphosphate Plants Corporation and the gunpowder factory’s name was changed to Vihtavuori Oy.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.3"":{""title"":""1950s: Growth backed up by contracts"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.3.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.3.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1952 Dividing markets\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Typpi Oy was a major competitor of the Sulfuric Acid and Superphosphate Plants Corporation, but the two companies entered cooperation with a contract signed in 1952.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1955 Martti Hovi as Managing Director\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Martti Hovi\u003c/strong> became the Managing Director of the corporation after Fredrik Gustaf Hackzell retired in 1955. Agronomist Hovi was one of Sulfuric acid and Superphosphate Plants Corporation’s own, having started his career at the company already in 1940. Hovi lead the corporation for 20 years, until 1975.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1957\u003c/strong> \u003cstrong>Beyond fertilizer production\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Vuorikemia Oy was founded on June 8, 1957 in order to produce titanium oxide from sulfuric acid. A titanium oxide plant was built in Pori, the first real step beyond fertilizer production for the company.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.4"":{""title"":""1960s: Chemistry in a broader sense"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.4.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.4.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1960 Aluminum sulphate plant\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>October 1960 saw the launch of a new aluminum sulphate plant in Harjavalta, the company’s second venture beyond the fertilizer industry. The aluminum sulphate was used, for example, in the paper industry and water purifying.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1961 Name change\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The Sulfuric Acid and Superphosphate Plants Corporation changed its name into Rikkihappo Oy at the beginning of the 1960s. Together with the name change, there were also organizational changes in order to streamline operations.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1962 Expansions in Kokkola\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The production of sulfuric acid was increased at the Kokkola plants and production of sodium sulfate for paper manufacture, and calcium chloride used as road deicing salt was also started. The investment was the company’s largest up to that point, making it a wide-ranging operator in the chemical industry. As the sulfuric acid production capacity in Kokkola was expanded, its production in Lappeenranta stopped.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.5"":{""title"":""1970s: Chemistry, minerals, nutrients"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.5.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.5.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1971 Merger with a rival\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The state-owned fertilizer companies Rikkihappo Oy and Typpi Oy signed a merger agreement on June 11, 1971, resulting only one state-owned fertilizer producer left in Finland: Rikkihappo Oy.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1972 Chemistry, minerals, nutrients\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Rikkihappo Oy’s name was changed to Kemira Oy on July 1, 1972. The new name came about through a naming competition for employees and is thought to come from the Finnish words for chemistry, minerals and nutrients: kemiaa, mineraaleja and ravinteita.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1972 Significant paint producer\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>In May 1972 all shares of Oy Schidlt &amp; Hallberg Ab were transferred to Kemira. The company acquisition was a significant expansion into the paint industry. The subsidiary named Tikkurilan Väritehtaat Oy became one of our most essential supporting pillars for decades.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1974 First steps in internationalization\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The acquisition of Säteri was the first in Kemira’s internationalization, but the foreign subsidiaries were sold by the end of the decade. In 1975, Martti Hovi was transferred to the position of chairman of the board and \u003cstrong>Yrjö Pessi\u003c/strong> took on the duties as Managing Director.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.6"":{""title"":""1980s: Decade of internationalization"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.6.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.6.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1980 Siilinjärvi phosphate mine\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The Siilinjärvi phosphate mine was opened on March 26, 1980, our 60th anniversary. The phosphate obtained in Siilinjärvi was exceptionally pure, which ensured a competitive advantage for the fertilizers produced from it.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1982 Increasingly international\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Kemira found it important to respond to the expansion of its Norwegian competitor Norsk Hydron and acquired the British Lindsey &amp; Kestevan Fertilisers Limited in 1982. This began our internationalization with acquisitions in the following years for fertilizer plants in Belgium, France, the Netherlands and Denmark.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1984 Trouble in Britain\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Tikkurila acquired the British MacPherson Paints Ltd in 1984 to access the Western European market. The company was sold at the beginning of the 1990s when it did not deliver the desired results. Tikkurila then focused its operations on the Baltic region, instead of Western Europe.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1984 Biotechnology\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Kemira had faith in the rise of biotechnology, investing in gene technology and biotechnology. However, the biotechnology group couldn&#8217;t fulfill its goals, and we broke away from the industry during the 1990s.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1989 Hydrochemistry from Sweden\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>In 1989, The Swedish Boliden Kemi AB, a traditional pulp and paper industry expert who also had strong hydrochemistry expertise was acquired. Providing a solid foundation in Europe, we continued acquisitions in the hydrochemistry industry. As a result, hydrochemistry expertise quickly became one of our cornerstones at Kemira.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.7"":{""title"":""1990s: Stock exchange listing!"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.7.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.7.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1991 Setback in Britain\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The British Department of Commerce and Industry put an end to the expansion of Kemira’s fertilizer group in Europe by denying the sale of 10 ICI Group fertilizer plants to Kemira.  We also faced challenges from the recession that started at the same time. In September 1991 \u003cstrong>Heimo Karinen\u003c/strong> began as Kemira’s CEO with the unpleasant job of restructuring the company.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1991 Restructuring begins\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>One of the first tasks for CEO Karinen was to close the Oulu fertilizer plant on November 27, 1991. Under the direction of Karinen, Kemira Coatings Ltd, i.e. the former MacPherson trade and construction paint business, as well as some operations of the biotechnology group, were quickly sold.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1994 Stock exchange listing\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Kemira’s stock exchange listing finally went through when the Ministry of Trade and Industry changed its stance on the issue. In connection with the listing, Kemira&#8217;s lines of production were corporatized, and we became a holding company with independent subsidiaries accountable for their profit and loss.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1997 Investments in hydrogen peroxide\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>A new hydrogen peroxide plant was built on the Helsingborg site in Sweden in 1997, and during the following year, the hydrogen peroxide plant of the South Korean Hanwha Chemical Corporation was taken over by Kemira. Furthermore, the Oulu plants were expanded to produce peracetic acid. As a result, we were in an increasingly competitive position in the changing paper industry.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>1997 Divestments continue\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The Vihtavuori gunpowder plant had never properly matched Kemira’s range, and the majority stock of the paper mill was transferred to the State in early 1997. Kemira Fibres Oy, Säteri&#8217;s successor, was sold to the Indonesian April group in June 1997.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.8"":{""title"":""2000s: Water is everything"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.8.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.8.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2002 Dendrochemistry expertise\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>In February 2002, Kemira acquired the American Vinings Industries Inc. The deal made us a globally significant supplier of specialty chemicals for the forestry sector.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2003 Management upheaval\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Kemira’s board of directors was reorganized in April 8, 2003, and in November of the same year, the CEO was also changed. On February 1, 2004, \u003cstrong>Lasse Kurkilahti\u003c/strong> replaced \u003cstrong>Tauno Pihlava\u003c/strong>, who had led the company for four years.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2004 Breaking away from fertilizers\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>In October 2004, Kemira GrowHow, formerly called Agro, was separated from Kemira. GrowHow’s shares were distributed as dividend payments to stockholders, and we sold just under a third of our stock to investors with the remaining shares sold in May of the following year.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2005 Leading chemical producer for paper and pulp\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>With the acquisition of both Finnish Chemical&#8217;s plants in February and German Lanxess’ paper business in December. we became the world&#8217;s leading producer of chemicals for the paper and pulp industry and the only producer in the world with a full line of products for pulp bleaching. The acquisition of Cytec’s hydrochemical and acrylamide businesses in the US in 2006 significantly strengthened our expertise in the fields of hydrochemistry, oil and mining.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2007 No longer a state-owned company\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>State transfers less than a third of Kemira&#8217;s shares to domestic investors, reducing state ownership from 48.6% to 16.5%.  Oras Invest, owned by the Paasikivi family, became the largest owner.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2008 New strategy\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Harri Kerminen\u003c/strong> started as the CEO of the company, while Kurkilahti continued as an advisor to the company&#8217;s Board of Directors.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Kemira announced new strategy shifting focus to hydrochemistry and water-intensive industries, such as pulp and paper, oil and mining, as well as municipal and industrial water treatment. Water purification, hydrochemicals and other water technology already accounted for three fourths of the company&#8217;s turnover the year following the publication of the strategy.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.9"":{""title"":""2010s: Modern Kemira"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.9.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.9.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2010 Farewell to paint\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>In March 2010, Tikkurila was listed on the Helsinki Stock Exchange and we distributed 86 percent of its shares as dividends. With the separation of Tikkurila, we lost a significant part of its turnover, but at the same time, it was an expression of the new strategy.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2010 Further focus on hydrochemistry \u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>As we focused on our water-related businesses aligned to our strategy, the Kokkola sulfuric acid plant was sold to Boliden Kokkola Oy on 1 May 2010 and the formic acid business to Taminco on December 23, 2013.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2013 Where water meets chemistry (?)\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>On July 1, 2013, Kemira announced the acquisition the Italian 3F Chimica, a producer of polymers for industry and wastewater treatment strengthening its position as one of the leading international polymer manufacturers. In the following year, we further strengthened our position in the packaging board industry and in the Asian market by acquiring AkzoNobel&#8217;s paper chemical business.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2014 Jari Rosendal sets a new course\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Jari Rosendal\u003c/strong> started as the CEO on May 1, 2014, replacing \u003cstrong>Wolfgang Büchele\u003c/strong>, who was the first foreign CEO of Kemira from 2012.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Expanding our footprint in the growing APAC region, the Nanjing, China plant was opened. And our commitment to the pulp and paper industry was demonstrated with the acquisition of the BASF AKD emulsion business and the expansion of our production at Telêmaco Borba, Brazil.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2015 Expanding to meet customer needs\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Focus on pulp and paper industry continued in 2015, with expansion at San Giorgio, Italy targeting the tissue industry in EMEA. During the same year, the acquisition of AkzoNobel paper chemicals business was completed in May. The following year, the Ortiguiera, Brazil site began production of sodium chlorate and in 2017, the Joutseno sodium chlorate expansion was successfully started up.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>In June 2015, production started at our new water treatment chemicals plant in Tarragona, Spain.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2018 Adding to your everyday\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>In 2017, a new sizing production line opened in Nanjing, China and an investment in our Estella, Spain site brought new wet strength resin production to the site.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>To further strengthen our position as a leading global supplier for the Pulp &amp; Paper industry, Kemira formed a joint venture (NewCo) in China with AKD producer, Shandong Tiancheng Wanfeng Chemical Technology. A multi-million euro investment to expand production at our Joutseno chlor-alkali site in Finland was announced in April.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2019 Addressing market demand\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>In 2019, we announced significant capacity extension of our ferric sulfate water treatment chemicals production line in Goole, UK to address expected market demand for coagulants used in water treatment, driven by stricter regulation regarding e.g. phosphorus removal. We also broke ground on a polymer expansion at our Mobile, USA site and added sodium chlorate capacity to our Eastover, USA plant.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.10"":{""title"":""2020s: Celebrating a sustainable future and an innovative past"",""body"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:47915.content.3.items.10.body.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""__typename"":""ExpandableListItem""},""Page:47915.content.3.items.10.body.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>\u003cstrong>2020\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>In February, we announced challenging new climate change targets to reach carbon neutrality by 2045.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>On March 26, we celebrated 100 years of chemistry.\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""Page:47915.content.4"":{""__typename"":""SocialMediaTeasers"",""title"":""Kemira in social 6070649188	2020-11-27T12:22:21Z	“The Jury was very impressed by the quality and energy of the students. Every team was able to identify and address relevant global megatrends as well as Kemira’s long-term strategic ambitions. The proposals were innovative and courageous, and the presentations were inspiring and professional. Choosing the winner among a group of strong candidates was a difficult task as all teams had their own strengths and the overall quality was high. Ultimately the Blue Team claimed the victory with a proposal which addressed global challenges such as climate action and energy transition, was a great example of the “waste to value” concept, tapped into the benefits of digitalization of operations, and was a strong fit with Kemira’s current and future markets and interests.”

100 years of Kemira – a virtual Boot Camp with Aalto University students"",""shortTitle"":""Next 100 years of Kemira – a virtual Boot Camp with Aalto University students"",""lead"":""\u003cp>Kemira arranged a 2-day-long virtual Boot Camp for Aalto University students together with our Espoo R&D center in November 2020. The Boot Camp was kicked off on November 2 when students were invited to build the future of bio-based chemical industry by ideating new offering, business models, and service design. \u003c/p>\n"",""shortLead"":""\u003cp>Kemira arranged a 2-day-long virtual Boot Camp for Aalto University students together with our Espoo R&D center in November 2020. The Boot Camp was kicked off on November 2 when students were invited to build the future of bio-based chemical industry by ideating new offering, business models, and service design. \u003c/p>\n"",""postType"":""news"",""featuredMedia"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:54202.featuredMedia"",""typename"":""FeaturedMedia""},""additionalContent"":null,""content"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:54202.content.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""contact"":null,""companyInformation"":null,""meta"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:54202.meta"",""typename"":""Meta""},""overrideUrls"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:54202.overrideUrls"",""typename"":""OverrideUrl""},""__typename"":""Page""},""$Page:54202.featuredMedia"":{""sourceUrl"":""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/11/bootcamp.jpg"",""sizes"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:54202.featuredMedia.sizes"",""typename"":""MediaSizes""},""__typename"":""FeaturedMedia""},""$Page:54202.featuredMedia.sizes.articleImage"":{""mimeType"":null,""sourceUrl"":""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/11/bootcamp-640x274.jpg"",""width"":640,""height"":274,""__typename"":""MediaSize""},""$Page:54202.featuredMedia.sizes"":{""articleImage"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:54202.featuredMedia.sizes.articleImage"",""typename"":""MediaSize""},""full"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:54202.featuredMedia.sizes.full"",""typename"":""MediaSize""},""__typename"":""MediaSizes""},""$Page:54202.featuredMedia.sizes.full"":{""mimeType"":null,""sourceUrl"":""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/11/bootcamp.jpg"",""width"":1426,""height"":610,""__typename"":""MediaSize""},""Page:54202.content.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>Altogether around 20 students in four teams took part in the event that was launched on November 17 by our President &amp; CEO \u003cstrong>Jari Rosendal\u003c/strong> and on November 18 they pitched the ideas to the Kemira Boot Camp Jury.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Reetta Strengell\u003c/strong>, Director, R&amp;D, was one the organizers of the event.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>“We had a successful and inspiring virtual Boot Camp with Aalto University students. The Boot Camp was originally planned to be organized as f-to-f in spring 2020 but plans were cancelled due to Covid19. However, now we have proven that the event was a success via Teams as well! Collaboration with Aalto University’s professor \u003cstrong>Tapani Vuorinen\u003c/strong> worked well.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>During these two days of Boot Camp, international and multidisciplinary teams developed their solutions together with our mentors. In addition, teams were able to use various experts from the entire organization, if they needed more detailed information about some particular topics. The outcome of their work was amazing – in such a short time period students were able to prepare professional proposals and presentations. For sure, we’d like to continue this cooperation with Aalto in the future, and this concept can be well implemented in other internal innovations as well,” Reetta comments.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Winning team and their idea\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>At the end of day 2, the teams pitched their ideas to Kemira’s Jury and one team was chosen as the winner.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Sampo Lahtinen\u003c/strong>, our head of the Espoo R&amp;D center, was a Jury member and commented the following:\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>“The Jury was very impressed by the quality and energy of the students. Every team was able to identify and address relevant global megatrends as well as Kemira’s long-term strategic ambitions. The proposals were innovative and courageous, and the presentations were inspiring and professional. Choosing the winner among a group of strong candidates was a difficult task as all teams had their own strengths and the overall quality was high. Ultimately the Blue Team claimed the victory with a proposal which addressed global challenges such as climate action and energy transition, was a great example of the “waste to value” concept, tapped into the benefits of digitalization of operations, and was a strong fit with Kemira’s current and future markets and interests.”\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The mentor for the Blue team was \u003cstrong>Timo Härmä\u003c/strong>, Sr Manager, R&amp;D.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>“It was very interesting, inspiring and refreshing experience to work with Aalto University students in this Boot Camp. The team had actually worked on some ideas and questions on bio-based area and we had a pre-meeting where we went those through and managed to select some potential topics for the pitch. Feeling in the team was good all the time and we were already able to choose the main topic for pitch from several ideas already during the first day. Working through Teams went also surprisingly well even though I would have preferred to have us all in one place face to face. Data sharing in Teams chat was very intensive and I was very happy with the efficient team work and utilization of their different kind of competencies during the whole process. At the end presentation material was looking really great, we managed to practice it and the actual pitch by the whole team went very well.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Congratulations to the Blue team and thanks  to experts from R&amp;D and Sustainability organization who commented the first version and helped move it into the right direction!”\u003c/p>\n\u003ch2>\u003cstrong>Feedback from the winning team\u003c/strong>\u003c/h2>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Caro Stefano:\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>“I really liked the camp, and I think this online version was really interesting, as we worked as a team with different backgrounds, different nationalities and even different locations worldwide. In my opinion this event could be considered as a real life challenge when working in a multinational company. The assistance of Timo was really precious. The initial challenge was to understand what to do, so the first days was just inventing the idea from scratch without any target. But I think that was also part of the challenge.”\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Irene Purasachit:\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>“The Boot Camp was amazing! I really learnt so much during the two days especially as I’m from Design and have very little knowledge of chemistry. Our team mentor, Timo Härmä, provided us with such insightful insights and it was great to be able to hear from the other experts in each area once we came up with a specific idea or needed more information. I was slightly intimidated by the challenge (and working fully through Teams) at first but with such a multidisciplinary team but we were able to generate many interesting topics and then concentrate on the right portion with the support of the experts. Overall, this was such a great and unique experience for me. I’m glad I decided to take part in this course and appreciate Kemira for not cancelling the camp but making it happen smoothly virtually!”\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Anna Pölönen:\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>“The Boot Camp was very insightful! I&#8217;m amazed by the wonderful team I got to be a part of; I learned a great deal from the team and our mentor Timo Härmä. Couldn&#8217;t have imagined working with such amazing people! On the other hand, hearing Kemira&#8217;s experts and getting to know more about what they&#8217;re working on made a positive impact of Kemira as an organization and employer.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>From an IEM (Industrial Engineering and Management) student&#8217;s point of view the event was a great way for Kemira to apply external innovation to search for new ideas. The event was organized very well and as a participant I hope there will be other events alike: I think that on both the organizer and participants&#8217; side this kind of collaboration generates insights that might not emerge otherwise. Thank you for organizing the Kemira next 100 years boot camp!”\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""$Page:54202.meta"":{""title"":""Next 100 years of Kemira – a virtual Boot Camp with Aalto University 6070649188	2020-09-20T10:51:56Z	Kemira raises its climate ambition to carbon neutrality by 2045 - Kemira.com
6070649188	2020-09-20T10:51:56Z	Kemira raises its climate ambition to carbon neutrality by 2045
6070649188	2020-09-20T10:51:56Z	Kemira joins the growing ranks of global companies aiming for carbon neutrality and supporting the Paris Agreement.
6070649188	2020-09-20T10:51:56Z	Kemira has set a target of 30% reduction in combined so-called Scope 1 and Scope 2 greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions by 2030, from the 2018 baseline of 0.93 MTCO2e. The long-term ambition is to be carbon neutral across the whole company by 2045 for combined scope 1 and 2 emissions.
6070649188	2020-09-20T10:51:56Z	For scope 3 emissions, Kemira is committed to working with suppliers to decrease the carbon footprint of our purchased goods and services. To that end, Kemira will also be encouraging suppliers to set their own ambitious GHG reduction targets aligned with the Paris Agreement. Kemira’s R&D function is working towards developing more products from bio-based and industrial by-products raw materials, helping to further reduce scope 3 emissions.

raises its climate ambition to carbon neutrality by 2045"",""shortTitle"":""Kemira raises its climate ambition to carbon neutrality by 2045"",""lead"":"""",""shortLead"":""\u003cp>Kemira Oyj\u003cbr />Press Release\u003cbr />February 11, 2020, at 8.35 am (CET+1)\u003c/p>\n"",""postType"":""release"",""featuredMedia"":null,""additionalContent"":null,""content"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:46554.content.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""meta"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:46554.meta"",""typename"":""Meta""},""overrideUrls"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:46554.overrideUrls"",""typename"":""OverrideUrl""},""__typename"":""Page""},""Page:46554.content.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp>Kemira Oyj\u003cbr />\nPress Release\u003cbr />\nFebruary 11, 2020, at 8.35 am (CET+1)\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Kemira raises its climate ambition to carbon neutrality by 2045\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Kemira joins the growing ranks of global companies aiming for carbon neutrality and supporting the Paris Agreement.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Kemira has set a target of 30% reduction in combined so-called Scope 1 and Scope 2 greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions by 2030, from the 2018 baseline of 0.93 MTCO2e. The long-term ambition is to be carbon neutral across the whole company by 2045 for combined scope 1 and 2 emissions.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>&#8220;Our upgraded target shows that Kemira fully supports the ambition of the UNFCCC Paris Agreement and that we recognize our contribution to the collaboration needed across sectors and stakeholders to solve climate change&#8221;, says \u003cstrong>Jari Rosendal\u003c/strong>, President and CEO.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>The key solutions that will enable emissions reductions include: sourcing zero-emission electricity, switching to renewables for our sites, electrification of processes at our sites, and energy efficiency. Offsetting through nature-based solutions remains a long-term option, but at the lowest level in Kemira’s mitigation hierarchy.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>For scope 3 emissions, Kemira is committed to working with suppliers to decrease the carbon footprint of our purchased goods and services. To that end, Kemira will also be encouraging suppliers to set their own ambitious GHG reduction targets aligned with the Paris Agreement. Kemira’s R&amp;D function is working towards developing more products from bio-based and industrial by-products raw materials, helping to further reduce scope 3 emissions.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>&#8220;Kemira’s action for the climate is also visible in our products and solutions. Our biggest sustainability impact comes from helping our customers improve end-use resource efficiency – and over half of our revenue already comes from sales of these products&#8221;, adds Jari Rosendal.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Energy efficiency improvements are a key contributor to this resource efficiency, but Kemira also helps customers in other ways like improving biogas yields at wastewater treatment plants. In 2019, Kemira also helped avoid emissions by providing 414 GWh of excess heat from our manufacturing to companies and communities around our sites.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>&#8220;Meeting the ambition of the Paris Agreement requires all parts of society and all sectors to work together. We will be dependent on the choices that the power sector makes, for instance. Similarly, at Kemira, we feel it is important to show that it is possible even for the chemical sector to make absolute emissions reductions and support our customers in their journey&#8221;, highlights \u003cstrong>Rasmus Valanko\u003c/strong>, Director, Sustainability.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>For more information, please contact\u003c/strong>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Kemira Oyj\u003cbr />\nRasmus Valanko, Director, Sustainability\u003cbr />\nTel. +358 40 658 1979\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003cstrong>Kemira\u003c/strong> is a global chemicals company serving customers in water intensive industries. We provide best suited products and expertise to improve our customers’ product quality, process and resource efficiency. Our focus is on pulp &amp; paper, oil &amp; gas and water treatment. In 2019, Kemira had annual revenue of around EUR 2.7 billion and over 5,000 employees. Kemira shares are listed on the Nasdaq Helsinki Ltd.\u003cbr />\nwww.kemira.com\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""$Page:46554.meta"":{""title"":""Kemira raises its climate ambition to carbon 6070649188	2020-09-27T07:35:33Z	To stay ahead of the competition and respond to the need for ambitious climate action, the chemicals sector as a whole will need to do more across its own footprint. “Kemira is well positioned to play a key role in global efforts to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, in our own operations, but especially in helping our customers through our innovative products and expertise that increase resource efficiency”, emphasized

quartile disclosure for Kemira in 2018 CDP rankings"",""shortTitle"":""Top quartile disclosure for Kemira in 2018 CDP rankings"",""lead"":null,""shortLead"":""\u003cp>\u003cspan class=\""hugin\"">\u003c/p>\n\u003cp class=\""hugin\"">Kemira Oyj\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Press Release\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />January 24, 2019 at 9 am (CET+1)\u003c/p>\n\u003cp class=\""hugin\"" style=\""border-style:none;\"">Top quartile disclosure for Kemira in 2018 CDP rankings\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Kemira received a B score in CDP's 2018 rankings. This puts Kemira in the top quartile of the chemicals sector companies requested to disclose to CDP, reflecting the company's continued co&nbsp;\u003cspan class=\""huginsnippet\"">(...)\u003c/span>\u003c/span>\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>\u003c/span> \u003c/p>\n"",""postType"":""release"",""featuredMedia"":null,""additionalContent"":null,""content"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:31250.content.0"",""typename"":""Wysiwyg""}],""meta"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:31250.meta"",""typename"":""Meta""},""overrideUrls"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:31250.overrideUrls"",""typename"":""OverrideUrl""},""__typename"":""Page""},""Page:31250.content.0"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003cp class=\""hugin\"">Kemira Oyj\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Press Release\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />January 24, 2019 at 9 am (CET+1)\u003c/p>\n\u003cp class=\""hugin\"" style=\""border-style:none;\"">\u003cstrong class=\""hugin\"">Top quartile disclosure for Kemira in 2018 CDP rankings\u003c/strong>\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Kemira received a B score in CDP&#8217;s 2018 rankings. This puts Kemira in the top quartile of the chemicals sector companies requested to disclose to CDP, reflecting the company&#8217;s continued commitment to transparency, increasing energy efficiency and sourcing renewable energy for our operations.\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />This most recent CDP disclosure round saw an increase of 11% in companies participating, taking the total to over 7,000 companies of which 97 were from the chemicals sector. &#8220;The steady growth in disclosure &#8211; now representing over 50% of global market capitalization &#8211; is welcomed by Kemira since it allows us to have a true benchmark of our performance&#8221;, said \u003cstrong class=\""hugin\"">Tuula Paajanen\u003c/strong>, Director of Corporate Responsibility. \u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Kemira&#8217;s score was higher than the chemical sector average of C, and higher than the European regional average of B-. This 2018 result shows that Kemira is on the right track, balancing sustainability with profitability. The score also aligns well with Kemira&#8217;s focus on products that help customers do more with less &#8211; less raw materials, water and energy.\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />To stay ahead of the competition and respond to the need for ambitious climate action, the chemicals sector as a whole will need to do more across its own footprint. &#8220;Kemira is well positioned to play a key role in global efforts to reduce greenhouse gas emissions, in our own operations, but especially in helping our customers through our innovative products and expertise that increase resource efficiency&#8221;, emphasized \u003cstrong class=\""hugin\"">Tero Huovinen\u003c/strong>, SVP, Communications and Corporate Responsibility. \u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />The results were published January 22, 2019, read more:\u003ca class=\""hugin\"" href=\""http://www.cdp.net/en/scores%20\"" target=\""_blank\"">www.cdp.net/en/scores&nbsp; \u003c/a>\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Read more about Kemira&#8217;s environmental performance and disclosure: \u003ca class=\""hugin\"" href=\""http://www.kemira.com/investors\"" target=\""_blank\"">www.kemira.com/investors\u003c/a>\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cstrong class=\""hugin\"">For more information, please contact:\u003c/strong>\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Kemira Oyj\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Tuula Paajanen, Corporate Responsibility\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Tel.&nbsp; +358 50 527 4413\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Tero Huovinen, Communication\u003cbr class=\""hugin\"" />Tel. +358 10 862 1153\u003c/p>\n\u003cp class=\""hugin\"">Kemira is a global chemicals company serving customers in water intensive industries. We provide expertise, application know-how and chemicals that improve our customers&#8217; product quality, process and resource efficiency. Our focus is on pulp &amp; paper, oil &amp; gas and water treatment. In 2017, Kemira had annual revenue of around EUR 2.5 billion and 4,732 employees. Kemira shares are listed on the Nasdaq Helsinki Ltd. \u003ca class=\""hugin\"" href=\""http://www.kemira.com\"" target=\""_blank\"">www.kemira.com\u003c/a>\u003c/p>\n"",""align"":""left""},""$Page:31250.meta"":{""title"":""Top quartile disclosure for Kemira in 2018 CDP 6070649188	2020-09-30T19:49:07Z	Periaatteemme on, että kaikki integroituun johtamisjärjestelmään kuuluvat toiminnot ovat kansainvälisten standardien mukaisia. Tavoitteemme on, että kaikki toimintomme ovat sertifioitavissa seuraavien kolmen kansainvälisen standardin mukaisesti: ISO 9001:2015 (laatu), ISO 14001:2015 (ympäristö) ja OHSAS 18001:2007 (työterveys ja työturvallisuus). Lisäksi sovellamme energianhallintajärjestelmien ISO 50001 -standardia tuotantolaitoksiin, joiden energiankulutus on suuri.

huone/"",""attr"":"""",""target"":"""",""object_id"":19578,""object"":""page"",""object_slug"":""uutishuone"",""type"":""post_type"",""type_label"":""Page"",""__typename"":""NavigationItem""},""NavigationItem:25638"":{""id"":25638,""parent"":25637,""title"":""Yritysvastuu"",""url"":""https://www.kemira.com/fi/konserni/yritysvastuu/"",""attr"":"""",""target"":"""",""object_id"":19572,""object"":""page"",""object_slug"":""yritysvastuu"",""type"":""post_type"",""type_label"":""Page"",""__typename"":""NavigationItem"",""children"":null},""NavigationItem:25763"":{""id"":25763,""parent"":25637,""title"":""Työpaikat"",""url"":""https://www.kemira.com/fi/konserni/tyopaikat/"",""attr"":"""",""target"":"""",""object_id"":25758,""object"":""page"",""object_slug"":""tyopaikat"",""type"":""post_type"",""type_label"":""Page"",""__typename"":""NavigationItem"",""children"":null},""NavigationItem:19604"":{""id"":19604,""parent"":0,""title"":""Yhteystiedot"",""url"":""https://www.kemira.com/fi/yhteystiedot/"",""attr"":"""",""target"":"""",""object_id"":19582,""object"":""page"",""object_slug"":""yhteystiedot"",""type"":""post_type"",""type_label"":""Page"",""__typename"":""NavigationItem"",""children"":null},""$ROOT_QUERY.navigation({\""slug\"":\""main-menu-fi\""})"":{""items"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":false,""id"":""NavigationItem:19665"",""typename"":""NavigationItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":false,""id"":""NavigationItem:19600"",""typename"":""NavigationItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":false,""id"":""NavigationItem:19666"",""typename"":""NavigationItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":false,""id"":""NavigationItem:25637"",""typename"":""NavigationItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":false,""id"":""NavigationItem:19604"",""typename"":""NavigationItem""}],""__typename"":""Navigation""},""$ROOT_QUERY.footer({\""lang\"":\""fi\""}).footerLink"":{""text"":""Yhteystiedot"",""type"":""link"",""to"":""https://www.kemira.com/fi/yhteystiedot/"",""action"":null,""__ty edia.sizes.articleImage"":{""mimeType"":null,""sourceUrl"":""https://kemiracom.blob.core.windows.net/kemiradata/2017/12/3821-medium-kemira-640x384.jpg"",""width"":640,""height"":384,""__typename"":""MediaSize""},""$Page:19572.featuredMedia.sizes"":{""articleImage"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.featuredMedia.sizes.articleImage"",""typename"":""MediaSize""},""full"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.featuredMedia.sizes.full"",""typename"":""MediaSize""},""__typename"":""MediaSizes""},""$Page:19572.featuredMedia.sizes.full"":{""mimeType"":null,""sourceUrl"":""https://kemiracom.blob.core.windows.net/kemiradata/2017/12/3821-medium-kemira.jpg"",""width"":1350,""height"":810,""__typename"":""MediaSize""},""Page:19572.content.0"":{""__typename"":""Hero"",""type"":""background"",""hero"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.content.0.hero"",""typename"":""BackgroundHero""}},""$Page:19572.content.0.hero"":{""title"":""Yritysvastuu"",""pretitle"":"""",""leadTextPosition"":""under"",""leadText"":""\u003cp>Yritysvastuu on toimintamme ytimessä: olemme sitoutuneet kestävään ja eettiseen toimintatapaan liiketoiminnassamme.  Vastuullinen toiminta merkitsee osakkeenomistajille vakaampaa sijoitusta. Asiakkaillemme se tarkoittaa parempaa resurssitehokkuutta ja luotettavuutta sekä varmuutta siitä, että heidän käyttämänsä kemikaalit on valmistettu ja toimitettu vastuullisesti.  Paikallisyhteisöissämme eri puolilla maailmaa se tarkoittaa, että olemme luotettava kumppani, työnantaja ja liiketoiminnan edelläkävijä.\u003c/p>\n"",""leadTextAuthor"":"""",""leadTextAuthorTitle"":"""",""link"":null,""__typename"":""BackgroundHero"",""image"":""https://kemiracom.blob.core.windows.net/kemiradata/2017/12/3936-hero-kemira.jpg"",""imageShade"":""light""},""Page:19572.content.1"":{""__typename"":""Wysiwyg"",""data"":""\u003ch2>Yritysvastuu Kemirassa\u003c/h2>\n\u003cp>Liiketoiminnallamme on erilaisia taloudellisia, ympäristö ja sosiaalisia vaikutuksia arvoketjun eri vaiheissa. Kemira ottaa vastuun toimintansa olennaisista vaikutuksista, pyrimme vähentämään negatiiviisia vaikutuksia ja niihin liittyviä riskejä sekä vahvistamaan positiivisia vaikutuksia ja hyödyntämällä niihin liittyviä mahdollisuuksia.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Arvostamme turvallista, puhdasta ja terveellistä ympäristöä ja hyvää elämänlaatua kuten myös sidosryhmämme. Vastuullinen toimintatapa on tärkeää liiketoimintamme, osakkeenomistajiemme, työntekijöidemme ja ympäristön kannalta, ja se edesauttaa pitkän aikavälin taloudellisesta menestystämme.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Keskitymme yritysvastuuseen aktiivisesti kolmella painopistealueella, jotka ovat:\u003c/p>\n\u003cul>\n\u003cli>Kestävät tuotteet ja ratkaisut\u003c/li>\n\u003cli>Toimintojen ja toimitusketjun vastuullisuus\u003c/li>\n\u003cli>Integriteetti ja vastuu henkilöstöstä\u003c/li>\n\u003c/ul>\n\u003cp>Nämä kolme painopistealuetta käsittävät yritysvastuun kuusi olennaisinta aihepiiriä, jotka liittyvät asiakkaiden kestävyysvaatimusten mukaisiin tuotteisiin, tuotteidemme turvalliseen käyttöön koko elinkaaren ajan, toimintojemme ympäristövaikutuksiin ja turvallisuuteen ja vastuullisiin liiketoimintakäytäntöihin toimitusketjussamme sekä vastuuseen henkilöstöstä ja liiketapaperiaatteiden mukaiseen toimintaan.\u003c/p>\n\u003ch4 style=\""text-align: center;\"">Yritysvastuun uudet painopistealueet\u003c/h4>\n\u003cp>\u003cimg class=\""alignnone wp-image-46679\"" src=\""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/how-we-manage-sustainability-1024x534.png\"" alt=\""How We Manage Sustainability\"" width=\""720\"" height=\""375\"" srcset=\""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/how-we-manage-sustainability-1024x534.png 1024w, https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/how-we-manage-sustainability-300x156.png 300w, https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/how-we-manage-sustainability-640x333.png 640w, https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/how-we-manage-sustainability-979x510.png 979w, https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/how-we-manage-sustainability-480x250.png 480w, https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/how-we-manage-sustainability-1017x530.png 1017w, https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/how-we-manage-sustainability-653x340.png 653w, https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/how-we-manage-sustainability-844x440.png 844w, />\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Olennaisista vaikutuksistamme voit lukea lisää \u003ca href=\""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2019/02/kemira-annual-report-2018.pdf\"" target=\""_blank\"" 19.2.2019\u003c/p>\n"",""featuredMedia"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia"",""typename"":""FeaturedMedia""},""postType"":""manual"",""slug"":null,""teaserLink"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.teaserLink"",""typename"":""Link""},""categories"":[],""__typename"":""ManualTeaser""},""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia"":{""mimeType"":""image/jpeg"",""sourceUrl"":""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/Annual-Report-2020.jpg"",""sizes"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia.sizes"",""typename"":""MediaSizes""},""__typename"":""FeaturedMedia""},""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia.sizes.articleImage"":{""mimeType"":null,""sourceUrl"":""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/Annual-Report-2020-640x384.jpg"",""width"":640,""height"":384,""__typename"":""MediaSize""},""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia.sizes"":{""articleImage"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia.sizes.articleImage"",""typename"":""MediaSize""},""pageImageTeaser"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia.sizes.pageImageTeaser"",""typename"":""MediaSize""},""pageImageTeaser2"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia.sizes.pageImageTeaser2"",""typename"":""MediaSize""},""full"":null,""large"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia.sizes.large"",""typename"":""MediaSize""},""__typename"":""MediaSizes""},""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia.sizes.pageImageTeaser"":{""mimeType"":null,""sourceUrl"":""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/Annual-Report-2020-567x340.jpg"",""width"":567,""height"":340,""__typename"":""MediaSize""},""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia.sizes.pageImageTeaser2"":{""mimeType"":null,""sourceUrl"":""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/Annual-Report-2020-733x440.jpg"",""width"":733,""height"":440,""__typename"":""MediaSize""},""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.featuredMedia.sizes.large"":{""mimeType"":null,""sourceUrl"":""https://media.kemira.com/kemiradata/2020/02/Annual-Report-2020-1024x614.jpg"",""width"":525,""height"":315,""__typename"":""MediaSize""},""$Page:19572.content.2.content.0.items.0.teaserLink"":{""text"":""Lue lisää"",""type"":""link"",""to"":""https://www.kemira.com/fi/yritys/media/uutishuone/tiedotteet/kemiran-vuosikertomus-2019-julkaistu/"",""action"":null,""__typename"":""Link""},""Page:19572.content.3"":{""__typename"":""ImageAccordion"",""title"":"""",""items"":[{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:19572.content.3.items.0"",""typename"":""ImageAccordionItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:19572.content.3.items.1"",""typename"":""ImageAccordionItem""},{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""Page:19572.content.3.items.2"",""typename"":""ImageAccordionItem""}]},""Page:19572.content.3.items.0"":{""image"":""https://kemiracom.blob.core.windows.net/kemiradata/2018/01/cr-sustainable-icon-kemira.png"",""title"":""Kestävät tuotteet ja ratkaisut"",""description"":""\u003cp>Tuotteitamme ja ratkaisujamme käytetään lähes kaikkialla maailmassa monenlaisiin tarkoituksiin vedenkäsittelystä teollisuuteen. Haluamme auttaa asiakkaitamme tehostamaan veden, energian ja raaka-aineiden käyttöä tuomalla markkinoille kestävän kehityksen mukaisia tuotteita ja ratkaisuja.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Meille on myös tärkeää, että tuotteidemme terveys-, turvallisuus- ja ympäristönäkökohdat koko elinkaaren ajalta otetaan huomioon kaikessa toiminnassamme.\u003c/p>\n"",""subtitle"":""Kestävät tuotteet"",""content"":""\u003cp>Asiakkaiden kestävyysvaatimuksia vastaavat tuotteet ja ratkaisut ovat olennaisen tärkeitä Kemiran pitkän aikavälin strategiassa ja ydinliiketoiminnassa. Otamme innovoinnissamme huomioon maailmanlaajuiset trendit, kuten kierrätyksen, verkkokaupan, keskiluokan kasvun, sääntelyn ja resurssien niukkuuden.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Asiakkaamme hyötyvät tuotteistamme ja ratkaisuistamme:\u003cbr />\n• tuotelaadun ja tuoton optimoinnissa\u003cbr />\n• prosessien ja energiankäytön tehostamisessa\u003cbr />\n• loppukäytön ja säännösten mukaisen vedenlaadun varmistamisessa.\u003c/p>\n\u003ch3>Tuotevastuullisuus\u003c/h3>\n\u003cp>Tuotevastuullisuus (Product Stewardship) tarkoittaa vastuullista tuotteisiin liittyvän työterveyden, turvallisuuden ja ympäristönäkökohtien hallintaa tuotteen koko elinkaaren ajan. Pidämme huolta, että kaikki sidosryhmämme – henkilöstömme, asiakkaamme ja arvoketjun kumppanit – voivat käsitellä tuotteitamme turvallisesti. Kemiran tuotevastuullisuuspolitiikka määrittää vähimmäisvaatimukset näille toiminnoille.\u003cbr />\nEnnakoimme mahdolliset säännösten muutokset ja haemme entistä turvallisempia ja kestävämpiä vaihtoehtoja käyttämillemme raaka-aineille ja myytäville tuotteille. Varmistamme myös, että tuotteitammme voidaan turvallisesti kuljettaa, käsitellä ja varastoida sekä asianmukaisesti poistaa käytöstä ja hävittää.\u003c/p>\n"",""__typename"":""ImageAccordionItem""},""Page:19572.content.3.items.1"":{""image"":""https://kemiracom.blob.core.windows.net/kemiradata/2018/01/cr-responsible-icon-kemira.png"",""title"":""Toimintojen ja toimitusketjun vastuul­ lisuus"",""description"":""\u003cp>Turvallisuus ja mahdollisimman pieni ympäristövaikutus ovat äärimmäisen tärkeitä toiminnassamme. Ympäristöasioiden, terveyden, työturvallisuuden ja laadun tehokas johtaminen on Kemiralle elintärkeää. Se on erottamaton osa liiketoimintamme päivittäistä johtamista ja päivittäistä työtämme. Haluamme yhtiönä toimia vastuullisesti koko arvoketjussamme raaka-aineiden hankinnasta oikeanlaisten tuotteiden valmistukseen ja oikea-aikaiseen ja turvalliseen toimitukseen asiakkaillemme.\u003c/p>\n"",""subtitle"":""Vastuulliset toiminnot"",""content"":""\u003cp>Vastuullinen johtaminen tuotantolaitoksissa tarkoittaa turvallisuus-ja ympäristö- ja laatuasioiden huomiointia kaikessa mitä teemme. Järjestelmällisellä johtamisella edistämme turvallisuuskäyttäytymistä ja ehkäisemme kemiallisten tuotantoprosessien häiriötilanteita, jotka saattaisivat vaikuttaa ympäristöön, tuotelaatuun, työntekijöiden terveyteen ja turvallisuuteen tai omaisuuteemme.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Periaatteemme on, että kaikki integroituun johtamisjärjestelmään kuuluvat toiminnot ovat kansainvälisten standardien mukaisia. Tavoitteemme on, että kaikki toimintomme ovat sertifioitavissa seuraavien kolmen kansainvälisen standardin mukaisesti: ISO 9001:2015 (laatu), ISO 14001:2015 (ympäristö) ja OHSAS 18001:2007 (työterveys ja työturvallisuus). Lisäksi sovellamme energianhallintajärjestelmien ISO 50001 -standardia tuotantolaitoksiin, joiden energiankulutus on suuri.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Jotkin päätuotelinjoistamme kuluttavat erittäin paljon energiaa, ja niiden hiilipäästöillä on ympäristövaikutuksia. Vähennämme hiilipäästöjä hankkimalla hiilivapaata energiaa ja parantamalla energiatehokkuutta teknologioilla ja toimintojen kehittämisellä.\u003c/p>\n\u003ch3>Vastuullinen toimitusketjun hallinta\u003c/h3>\n\u003cp>Yhteistyö vastuullisten ja innovatiivisten toimittajien kanssa vähentää raaka-aineiden hankintaan liittyviä riskejä ja parantaa hankintojen taloudellisuutta. Kaikkien toimittajiemme on noudatettava toimittajia, jakelijoita ja edustajia koskevia liiketapaperiaatteitamme kaikessa toiminnassaan Kemiran kanssa. Liiketapaperiaatteissa on määritetty vastuullista liiketoimintaa, ihmisoikeuksien kunnioittamista, asiallisia työoloja ja ympäristövastuuta koskevat vaatimukset. Lisäksi strategisten, ratkaisevan tärkeiden ja hankintamääriltään merkittävien toimittajien on osallistuttava vastuullisuuden arviointiprosessiin, joka perustuu YK:n Global Compact -aloitteen ja Responsible Care -ohjelman periaatteisiin.\u003c/p>\n"",""__typename"":""ImageAccordionItem""},""Page:19572.content.3.items.2"":{""image"":""https://kemiracom.blob.core.windows.net/kemiradata/2018/01/cr-people-icon-kemira.png"",""title"":""Integriteetti ja vastuu henkilöstöstä"",""description"":""\u003cp>Eettinen ja vastuullinen tapa toimia sekä hyvinvoiva henkilöstö ovat kaiken toimintamme perusta. Kulttuurimme perustuu avoimuuteen ja toistemme kunnioittamiseen. Sitoutumisemme henkilöstön kehittämiseen ja hyvinvointiin on menestyksemme perusta nyt ja tulevaisuudessa. Integriteetti alkaa meistä jokaisesta, ja liiketapaperiaatteemme ohjaavat käytännön toimintaamme ja päätöksentekoamme. Se, miten toimimme on mielestämme jopa tärkeämpää kuin se mitä teemme.\u003c/p>\n"",""subtitle"":""Yrityskulttuuri ja työntekijöihin sitoutuminen"",""content"":""\u003cp>Luomme pitkän aikavälin menestystä työntekijöillemme ja liiketoiminnallemme kehittämällä osaamistamme ja taitojamme, houkuttelemalla parhaat osaajat ja luomalla ympäristön, joka edistää aloitteellisuutta ja uusien ideoiden syntyä.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Pyrimme edistämään työvoiman monimuotoisuutta, kun rekrytoimme, kehitämme ja sitoutamme henkilöstöämme, ja haluamme varmistaa osallistavan työympäristön, jossa yksilöllisiä ominaisuuksiamme arvostetaan vahvuuksina. Kemiran 4 900 työntekijää edustavat 60:tä kansallisuutta\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Työntekijöinä haluamme, että Kemira on paikka, jossa voimme jatkuvasti oppia uutta ja kehittää itseämme. Yhtiö tarjoaa osaamiseen ja työtehtäviin perustuvia koulutusohjelmia sekä johtamis- ja kehittämiskoulutusta.\u003c/p>\n\u003ch3>Kemiran liiketapaperiaatteiden noudattaminen\u003c/h3>\n\u003cp>Liiketapaperiaatteemme määrittävät, miten teemme työtämme, mutta ne myös kertovat meille, miten voimme toteuttaa arvojamme ja periaatteitamme kaikissa päätöksissämme ja toimissamme. Liiketapaperiaattet auttavat meitä toimimaan oikein, tekemään päätöksiä, jotka perustuvat rehellisyyteen ja eettisyyteen, pitämään lupauksemme sekä kohtelemaan toisiamme ja liikekumppaneitamme oikeudenmukaisesti ja kunnioittavasti.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Jokainen työntekijämme saa tietoa liiketapaperiaatteista koulutuksen, sisäisen viestinnän ja esimiesten välityksellä. Työntekijät voivat ilmoittaa mahdollisista liiketapaperiaatteiden rikkomuksista ja muista huolenaiheistaan Ethics &amp; Compliance Hotline -ilmoituskanavan kautta.\u003c/p>\n\u003cp>Ethics and Compliance-ohjelmamme tavoitteena on varmistaa liiketapaperiaatteiden mukainen toiminta käytännössä.\u003c/p>\n"",""__typename"":""ImageAccordionItem""},""Page:19572.content.4"":{""__typename"":""Hero"",""type"":""image"",""hero"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.content.4.hero"",""typename"":""ImageHero""}},""$Page:19572.content.4.hero"":{""title"":""Yritysvastuun johtaminen"",""pretitle"":"""",""leadTextPosition"":""inside"",""leadText"":""\u003cp>Yritysvastuuta ohjaavat keskeisiltä osin arvonluontimallimme, sidosryhmiemme odotukset ja sitoutumisemme liiketapaperiaatteisiimme ja kansainvälisiin periaatteisiin.\u003c/p>\n"",""leadTextAuthor"":"""",""leadTextAuthorTitle"":"""",""link"":{""type"":""id"",""generated"":true,""id"":""$Page:19572.content.4.hero.link"",""typename"":""Link""},""__typename"":""ImageHero"",""image"":""https://kemiracom.blob.core.windows.net/kemiradata/2017/12/4006-medium-kemira.jpg""},""$Page:19572.content.4.hero.link"":{""text"":""Lue inside the box"",""subtitle"":null,""shortLead"":""\u003cp>As you would expect, any packaging material that comes into contact with your food has to comply with much stricter hygiene regulations than the box your new shoes come in. 5050773635	2020-08-24T22:52:28Z	ISO 14001
5050773635	2020-08-09T05:53:04Z	Environmental Management System Standard is similar in other aspects to the requirements of ISO 9001:2015 but targeted specifically at environmental issues particularly those aspects of the organisation or business which impact on the environment and which the business can control. ISO 14001 specifies the requirements for an environmental management system to allow an organisation to formulate policy and objectives taking into account legislative requirements. The system is based on the Plan – Do – Check – Act cycle and has a similar process approach to ISO 9001:2015 to which it is closely linked.
5050773635	2020-08-13T10:58:52Z	Management recognise that sustainability must be a key element of the business strategy to deliver future growth. A responsible approach to the environment is important to ensure that Bodycote has a sustainable long-term future. Already over 75% of Bodycote’s facilities have met the ISO 14001 standard which helps minimise the risk of adverse environmental effects and the aim is to achieve 100% accreditation in all plants during the coming years.
5050773635	2020-08-10T02:21:05Z	Norma systému environmentálního řízení se v ostatních aspektech podobá požadavkům normy ISO 9001:2008, ale je zaměřena konkrétně na problémy životního prostředí, zejména na ty aspekty organizace či podnikání, které mají vliv na životní prostředí a které může firma kontrolovat. Norma ISO 14001 určuje požadavky systému environmentálního řízení, aby společnostem umožnila vytvořit zásady a cíle a při tom zohlednit legislativní požadavky. Tento systém je založen na cyklu Plán – Provedení – Kontrola – Jednání a obsahuje podobný přístup k procesu, jako norma ISO 9001:2008, se kterou úzce souvisí.
5050773635	2020-08-09T05:43:10Z	Currently, Bodycote has four heat treatment plants in Turkey, which are accredited to ISO 9001, AS 9100, TS 16949 and comply to CQI-9. All four plants are expected to achieve ISO 14001 during 2014. The new Greenfield site will provide increased capacity to meet customer demand and will enable a more streamlined, quality-focused service.
5050773635	2020-08-05T10:11:21Z	Standard for miljøledelsessystem er i nogle henseende lig kravene for ISO 9001:2008, men den er særligt målrettet mod miljømæssige problemstillinger, især de områder af en organisation eller virksomhed, som påvirker miljøet, og som er under virksomhedens kontrol. ISO 14001 specificerer kravene til et miljøledelsessystem for at sætte en organisation i stand til at formulere en politik og mål, med øje for lovkrav. Systemet er baseret på cyklussen Planlæg – Foretag – Kontrollér – Udfør og har en lignende tilgang til processer som ISO 9001:2008, hvortil den er tæt forbundet.
5050773635	2020-08-05T10:46:37Z	– ISO 14001 miljøcertificeret
5050773635	2020-09-29T07:45:06Z	Bodycote hilft die CO2-Bilanz Ihrer Produkte zu verbessern.
5050773635	2020-09-21T14:51:53Z	Norma de los sistemas de gestión ambiental. Esta norma es similar en otros aspectos a los requisitos establecidos por ISO 9001:2008, si bien está específicamente dirigida a las cuestiones ambientales, en particular los aspectos de la organización o la empresa que repercuten en el medio ambiente y que la empresa puede controlar. La ISO 14001 especifica los requisitos para un sistema de gestión ambiental, para permitir que las organizaciones formulen políticas y objetivos teniendo en consideración los requisitos legislativos. El sistema se basa en el ciclo planificar, realizar, verificar y actuar y enfoca el proceso en forma similar a la ISO 9001:2008, con la que está estrechamente vinculado.

Wir setzen zertifizierte Management-Systeme nach ISO 9001 (Qualität), ISO 14001 (Umwelt) und OHSAS 18001 (Gesundheit und Sicherheit) an allen unseren weltweiten Standorten um. Dies ist eine effektive Methode, um Prozesse und Produkte auch weiterhin stetig zu verbessern.
2030392450	2020-08-09T11:21:31Z	Wir bieten unseren Kunden die besten Produkte, die zudem den höchsten Qualitätsstandards der Branche entsprechen. Wir setzen zertifizierte Management-Systeme nach ISO 9001 (Qualität), ISO 14001 (Umwelt) und OHSAS 18001 (Gesundheit und Sicherheit) an allen unseren weltweiten Standorten um. Dies ist eine effektive Methode, um Prozesse und Produkte auch weiterhin stetig zu verbessern. Einige unserer Standorte verfügen zudem über spezifische Zertifizierungen, beispielsweise IECEx 3.
2030392450	2020-08-13T13:48:02Z	Hydrocarbon feed pump
4250629234	2020-03-23T08:18:03Z	Umweltschonende Energiegewinnung.ist ein entscheidender Baustein zu einer noch ressourcensparenderen Produktionsweise. Bei Coppenrath & Wiese haben wir beständig die Wärmerückgewinnungswerte verbessert. Heute werden bereits mehr als 80 Prozent unseres verbrauchten Warmwassers durch Wärmerückgewinnung generiert, bis 2018 wollen wir den Wert weiter verbessern. Bereits seit 2010 verfügen wir über ein Umwelt-Management-System nach DIN ISO 14001, das zusätzlich für Transparenz sorgt und uns hilft, weitere Energieeinsparpotentiale zu identifizieren.
